data.title: Cramer's Investing Club: Stocks sink this week ahead of Big Tech earnings next
data.description: Markets continued to take a beating this week as investors appeared to be pricing in even more hawkish Fed action throughout the year.

data.title: MicroStrategy shares drop on bitcoin's slide, SEC rejection of company's crypto accounting
data.description: The software company's stock had been falling in tandem with the price of bitcoin, which dropped more than 10% Friday to its lowest point since August.

data.title: Amazon is on pace for its worst week in six months
data.description: If the stock remains down more than 8% for the week until close, it will be Amazon's worst week in six months.

data.title: The stock market is a 'superbubble' about to burst, top hedge fund manager warns
data.description: Stocks are off to a tough start this year. The tech-heavy Nasdaq is already in a correction, a more than 10% drop. And if one the most influential hedge fund managers is to be believed, this could be only the beginning of a very painful time for investors.
